title: Smart Data Models - Machine Learning Model
description: Data model for compilation of the elements of a machine learning model.

inputDataSources.description: Property. Current flooding level indicated by the sensing station corresponding to this observation, computed using referenceLevel and measuredDistance(currentLevel = referenceLevel - measuredDistance).

outputDataSources.description: Property. Reference danger level threshold value set for the sensing station corresponding to this observation. Flood level status is marked danger if the current level crosses the danger level threshold value.
